title: Intelligent Process Supervision Module (IPSM) Runtime State
description: Defines the mandatory, machine-readable state structure for the IPSM, emphasizing real-time telemetry, agent metrics, and diagnostics.

SystemStatusEnum.description: The overall operational health status of the IPSM.

AgentIdPattern.description: Standard identifier format for supervised agents.

ipms_version.description: The current version tag of the IPSM instance reporting the state (e.g., v94.1).

agent_management.description: Metrics and identifiers related to active agent supervision.

active_agent_ids.description: List of currently supervised agent unique identifiers.

total_supervised_processes.description: Total count of distinct processes managed across all active agents.

agents_in_critical_state.description: Count of agents currently flagged as CRITICAL and requiring intervention.

memory_allocated_mb.description: Total system memory (in MB) allocated to the IPSM and supervised tasks.

supervision_cycle_latency_ms.description: Time taken (in milliseconds) for the most recent complete supervision cycle.

operational_diagnostics.description: Counters and flags for transient internal IPSM events and soft failures.

error_count_last_cycle.description: Number of non-fatal internal errors detected since the last state update.

warning_flags.description: List of active operational warning flags (e.g., 'DB_CONNECTION_STALE').

last_update_timestamp_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) indicating when this state report was generated.
